title.narrative: World Vision / Local Ecosystem Development for Sustainable Tourism - 2nd phase

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to build a shareholder network and a co-creation platform for developing sustainable tourism in the Eastern Province of Sri Lanka. Eventually the project will contribute to the economic development of the area. The main target groups here are female-headed households people with disabilities and unemployed youth. The second phase of the project will continue directly from the obtained results of the first phase which closes in February 2015. The Koralaipattu Producers Group (KP G) that was created in the first phase will continue its work and the successful concept will be expanded into other communities in the Eastern Province. KPG has significantly increased the monthly income of its members most of whom are Tamil women and sol e providers of their families. Also other professional groups working in the tourism sector will get training and support through the project. A platform is formed that enables local communities to link to new shareholders and capacities in order to genera te income from sustainable tourism. World Vision?s Weconomy Start innovation program will work here as a platform bringing together the local knowledge and competence of WV Lanka and the companies interested in investing into Sri Lankan BOP-markets. The to tal budget of the second phase amounts to 50000 euros and its total duration is 9 months.
